name: Happy Pills
description: A web application for ordering happy pills with a user-friendly interface. I made this project to explore DOM programming. I used Html to code the website and Javascript to highlight the pill container images when selected. The website itself is a silly creation I came up with to illustrate the absurd idea of selling recreational possibly illegal drugs online.

name: Library Database
description: A database system for managing library books and member accounts. This is the project Im most proud of due to how extensive and varied the code is. I used a MVC framework to create this application with Java, HTML as well as Thymeleaf. You can create user and admin accounts with fully functioning acount security using Bcrypt although for demonstration purposes anyone can create an admin account. Due to server restrictions this website will take time to load.

name: Pet Catalog
description: A Pet catalog system made with the Angular framework. I created this project Primarily to demonstrate my ability to use Angular. In this project there's a catalog of pets to click on to find more data which is routed in the backend.

name: Our Solar System
description: An interactive guide to the solar system and its planets. This project uses more advanced DOM programming.
